ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: emerging from between the back-bone and the breast-bone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Issuing from (the pelvis) between the backbone and the ribs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: emanating from between the loins and the ribs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: which comes out of the loins and ribs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: That is issued from between the backs and the ribs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Proceeding from between the backbone and the ribs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Coming from between the back and the ribs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: issuing between the loins and the breast-bones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That issued from between the loins and ribs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: issuing from between the backbone and the breastbone:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That issueth from between the loins and the breast-bones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: which issues from between the loins and the breast-bones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Proceeding from between the backbone and the ribs:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Proceeding from between the back-bone and the ribs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: that issues from between the loins and the ribs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Issuing from between the backbone and the breastbones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [86:7] issuing from between the loins, of the man, and the breast-bones, of the woman.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That issued from between the loins) of a man (and ribs) the ribs of a woman.
